name: ShopCorn UK
tag_list: social-shopping, social-shopping-community, price-comparison, comparison-shopping, social-shopping-startup, product-reviews, social-community
overview:
ShopCorn is UK’s first social shopping community with a difference!!

ShopCorn allows users to find, submit, share, review and recommend deals from across the web in the DealsBox.

User Generated Price Comparison in the form of Deals Challenge is the killer idea which exists no where else on the web. Deals Challenge allows community users to challenge existing deals in the deals box. Users can find a deal on the web for the same product being offered by a different merchant and challenge any existing deal in the deals box.

Users of the community are also allowed to pen down their thoughts using blogs. Apart from this any user having questions around the products and services being offered on the web can take the help of fellow community users and get the answers quickly using QnA section of the community.

Interactivity in the form of voice, video and text chat makes ShopCorn stand out in the crowd.
